entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 15 except 9 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon with 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High 15 except 9 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023
